Text: can we still be friends Cc not been a good day for me but I do want to thank each of you for all of the help you have given me during the last months Also the great times weve had working and laughing together Now for the bad or good news the th of Jan will be my last day as I have excepted a new position at BP AMOCO It is with great pleasure knowing that I did beat Mark McCoy over there Thanks again and we will still be friends ej

Re Tuesday December th Cc be here Tuesday also Mark McCoy AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Re Tuesday December th Ill be here on Tuesday Mary Poorman AM To Michael nron Tom NRON Clem CT Robert CT Jackie CT Sabrae CT Carlos J CT Mark nron Aimee CT Mary nron Eddie nron cc Daren J CT Lauri A CT Subject Tuesday December th We will need a small staff to handle potential trades for Wed the th Most of the pipelines are out of the office so I would expect the work load to be minimal I plan on coming in and would like to have a minimum of three on staff so I need two volunteers one offsystem just in case If anyone is going to be in town please forward a number in case we need to call any additional people in or have you work on a laptop from home I will get with you after the new year to make up the holiday you miss or you can schedule your day now I have the calendars Also I will be out on vacation Friday Dec nd and will need someone to send the nominations to the plants I dont expect to have full system coverage just HPLHPL and HPLENA as needed Let me know if you are interested in learning how to do this Thank you Mary
